Utterance: Tai, ami coffee porjonto thamiye diyechi, karon ami jantam na tumi coffee kheyecho ki na. Tumi kemon acho?

Amader agei ei rokom kichu try korechi.
Ami bujhte parchi. Tumi jano, ami tomake erokom ekta chhobi oboshyo bhalobashi.
Ekdom besh kichu din dhore ei rokom obostha hoy nai. Ami chhilo amar purono jibon. Ami eto kichu kore kemon hoye jeto, tai ami janina. Na oi jon ta ke ki bojhabo, na ki obosthai hote hobe.
Tomar purono jiboner kon dike tomake kichu miss hoyeche?
Bandhobi-gon ke dekha, berano. Kintu ami shuru korte parchina.
Shuru kivabe korbo? Tumi din ki bhabe shuru koro?
Ami besh deri kheye shuye thaki. Ar ami janina, eto bhalo kore ei ghor ta kivabe sajabo, seta amake darate lagche. Tai ami ekhono kichu korina, amar moto harayejana.

Shune mone hocche tomake nijeo khub bhalo kore mone hoy. Mone rakho, jodi tomake ekhon theke thoda bhalo lage, tahole tomake aro utsahito hote ichhe korte pare, ar tomake tomar bandhobi-gon dekhte mile.
